title: France panorama. [No. 72/51]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. President Pompidou in Africa - the French president’s visit to Upper Volta and Togo. 2. Precious shells - fossils and shells. 3. The world of insects - research in the biological struggle for the protection of agriculture. 4. The arts: Etienne Martin - Etienne Martin, sculptor and professor at the Patie Fine Arts School; Van Dongen - Van Dongen restrospective.
